testsuite.name: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it

testcase.name: Given the internet is reachable
testcase.classname: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it

testcase.name: And an initialised environment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it

testcase.name: And the system is bootstrapped
testcase.classname: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it

testcase.name: Given the candidate "grails" version "2.1.0" is available for download
testcase.classname: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it

testcase.name: When I enter "sdk install grails 2.1.0" and answer "n"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it

testcase.name: Then the candidate "grails" version "2.1.0" is installed
testcase.classname: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it

testcase.name: And I see "Done installing!"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it

testcase.name: And I see "Do you want grails 2.1.0 to be set as default? (Y/n)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it

testcase.name: And I do not see "Setting grails 2.1.0 as default."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it

testcase.name: Then the candidate "grails" version "2.1.0" should not be the default
testcase.classname: Scenario: Install a candidate and do not select to use it
